product_name: Quiksilver Super OG Board Shorts - Boys'
long_description: Old school flavor meets new school performance with the retro styled Quiksilver Super OG Board Shorts for boys. They're made for high-performance action. Made of water-repellent 100% recycled polyester supersuede, these shorts have a short fly and basic drawcord closure. Hem and side binding detail offer a throwback look. Quiksilver Super OG Board Shorts have a back pocket with flap and a woven label at the bottom hem.
short_description: Old school flavor meets new school performance with the retro styled Quiksilver Super OG Board Shorts for boys. They're made for high-performance action.
